attributes.action: Completely remove the 'Reform Treaty' from the government's agenda, and hold a referendum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This 'Reform Treaty' (which is the same Constitution that, under a different title, has been rejected by the EU once already) is a definite risk to the rights we as a nation hold dear, except Primeminister Gordon Brown does not seem to be of a similar persuasion. Oh no, he wants to gamble with our rights and he does so from our government's new home in Brussels! I don't know about anybody else, but my family and I are feeling more and more left out of the equation these days.

So I put to you, Primeminister, that you hold a referendum as soon as possible and disregard this 'Reform Treaty' because it is bad news for the people of Britain.

Kind regards,
The British Nation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
